title: cmd/gofmt: strange indentation of +-separated args
body:
This indentation seems strange:

``` go
b := []byte(
	"foo" +
		"bar" +
		"baz",
)
```

(See playground [here](http://play.golang.org/p/uVLjjZV2gS).)

Not sure whether this is a bug or some weird corner case. I would've expected

``` go
b := []byte(
	"foo" +
	"bar" +
	"baz",
)
```

/cc @griesemer
